text: The wheels on the chariot go round and round..
Surtha Ek's natural talent for commanding chariots quickly earned him recognition among his people, and he soon became known as the most feared chariot master in all of Norsca.
Surtha Ek, the "Everchariot," looms over the battlefield astride his chariot, a relentless force of destruction and chaos.
Surtha Ek bestows his blessings upon his followers, granting them increased strength, speed, and resilience in battle
Surtha Ek leads his warriors on daring raids, increasing their plunder and spoils of war.
Surtha Ek and his chariot gain increased resistance to damage, allowing them to endure prolonged battles.
Surtha Ek's strategic genius increases the effectiveness of his army's maneuvers on the battlefield.
Surtha Ek charges his chariot into enemy lines, causing massive damage and disruption.
Surtha Ek channels the brutal savagery of the Norscan tribes, increasing the damage output of his army.
Surtha Ek leads the Varg tribe on a campaign of conquest, expanding their territory and influence across Norsca
Surtha Ek's presence on the battlefield inspires his warriors to fight with unparalleled ferocity, dealing increased damage to enemy units.
Dreadlash is infused with chaos runes, driving Ek's chariot's horses to a frenzy while delivering searing pain to his foes

Bloodspiller is a massive, obscure-painted chariot adorned with the skulls of fallen enemies and etched with blasphemous symbols of Chaos. Pulled by two ferocious chaos steeds, its wheels churn up the earth as it charges into battle, leaving destruction and chaos in its wake.
Surtha Ek, the "Everchariot," is a towering figure of muscle and fury, commanding his warriors from the back of his fearsome steed.

Surtha Ek, feared throughout the frozen wastes of Norsca as the "Everchariot," is a towering figure of muscle and fury. With a mane of unkempt hair and eyes ablaze with the fervor of battle, he exudes an aura of savage authority. Clad in the tattered remnants of his enemies' garb, he wears the trophies of his conquests as badges of honor. His voice, deep and resonant, carries the weight of command as he leads his warriors into battle. But it is his mastery of the chariot that truly sets him apart, as Thunderhoof thunders across the battlefield, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

In battle, Surtha Ek wields a whip with mastery honed through countless campaigns. Crafted from the sinew of defeated enemies and adorned with runes of chaos, the whip serves not only to drive the horses of his chariot into a frenzied charge but also to inflict searing pain upon his foes, leaving them broken and demoralized in his wake
A war chariot outfitted with copius amount of blades, well suited to running down infantries not quick enough to get out of its way.
